titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for a conditional adjournment of the House from June 30, 1988, until July 6, 1988, and a conditional recess or adjournment of the Senate from June 29, 1988, until July 6, 1988.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 6/29/1988--Introduced. Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives on June 30, 1988, until July 6, 1988, and for a recess or adjournment of the Senate from June 29, 1988, until July 6, 1988.
